body_content.explanation: done after someone dives (= jumps into water with their head and arms going in first, or swims under water with breathing equipment):
examples: The Olympic diver was mobbed by the media in the post-dive press conference.
The data collected during the dive can be transferred post-dive to a PC.

body_content.explanation: happening after something goes down very quickly or suddenly falls in value:
examples: Post-dive stock values will reduce consumer confidence, causing the economy to grow at a slower, more sustainable rate.
